NK003(ga)007:0: 'phags pa 'od zer dri med kyi rgyun gyi bzlas
NK003(ga)007:1: pa bya tshul 'chi med 'byung ba zhes bya ba
NK003(ga)007:2: bzhugs so // tshogs gnyis rgya mtsho'i bcud las 'khrungs //
NK003(ga)007:3: thub mchog nor bu'i 'od zer ni //
NK003(ga)007:4: byang chub bar du gtsug gi rgyan //
NK003(ga)007:6: 'di'i dbang thob cing dam tshig la gnas pa dag
NK003(ga)007:7: gis 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam
NK003(ga)007:8: par dag pa'i 'od kyi rnal 'byor rgyun khyer bsdus
NK003(ga)007:9: pa'i tshul la 'jug par spro na /
NK003(ga)007:10: kha zas ma zos pa'i gong ngam /
NK003(ga)007:11: sha chang sgog btsong sogs khong par ma song ba'i snga dro'i char khrus dang gtsang sbra byas la /
NK003(ga)007:13: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
NK003(ga)007:14: byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi //
NK003(ga)007:15: bdag dang gzhan don bsgrub slad du //
NK003(ga)007:16: bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do //
NK003(ga)007:17: phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi //
NK003(ga)007:18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' gson //
NK003(ga)007:19: bdag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir //
NK003(ga)007:20: deng nas byang chub sems bskyed do //
NK003(ga)007:21: lan gsum gyis skyabs su 'gro zhing sems bskyed /
NK003(ga)007:22: mdun gyi nam mkhar bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu /
NK003(ga)007:23: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK003(ga)007:24: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa /
NK003(ga)007:25: seng ge'i khri dang pad zla'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK003(ga)007:26: phyag gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'i
NK003(ga)007:27: 'khor du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
NK003(ga)007:29: de rnams kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer byung /
NK003(ga)007:30: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas /
NK003(ga)007:31: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK003(ga)007:32: 'od zer slar 'dus te rgyal ba rnams kyi gtsug tor la thim pas rgyal ba rnams dgyes te /
NK003(ga)007:33: ka la ping+ka'i dbyangs lta bu'i sgras gsang sngags gsungs
NK003(ga)007:34: pa'i sgra'i rjes zlos bdag nyid kyis byed par gyur
NK003(ga)007:38: pa ri shud+d+he ma na si /
NK003(ga)007:39: a b+h+ya tsi ta pra tish+thi ta n+aam /
NK003(ga)007:40: na mo b+ha ga wa te /
NK003(ga)007:43: sarba ta th+aa ga ta shud+d+he +aa yur bi sho d+ha ne /
NK003(ga)007:44: sam ha ra sam ha ra /
NK003(ga)007:45: sarba ta th+aa ga ta b+air+ya ba le na pra
NK003(ga)007:46: ti sam ha ra +aa yuh s+aa ra s+aa ra
NK003(ga)007:47: / sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa ma ya /
NK003(ga)007:50: bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya /
NK003(ga)007:51: ma ma sarba p+aa pam +aa wa ra na bi shud+d+he /
NK003(ga)007:53: tsha ra su bud+d+he bu d+d+he /
NK003(ga)007:54: hu ru hu ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)007:56: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma la bi sho d+ha ni /
NK003(ga)007:57: ru d+ha ba le pra ti sams+k+aa ra /
NK003(ga)007:58: ta th+aa ga ta d+h+aa tu d+hu re /
NK003(ga)007:61: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a d+hish+th+aa na a d+hish+thi te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)007:63: de dag nang rer tshar re ma chags par bzla zhing lan mang du grub na mchog go //
NK003(ga)007:65: gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te
NK003(ga)007:66: nyin gcig bzhin du rtag par gsang sngags lan re
NK003(ga)007:67: re ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bton na /
NK003(ga)007:68: de 'chi ba'i dus byas na longs spyod dang bde
NK003(ga)007:69: ba mi zad pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro
NK003(ga)007:70: // rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas
NK003(ga)007:71: nas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur
NK003(ga)007:72: zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran par yang 'gyur ro
NK003(ga)007:73: // // dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)007:74: zhes pas mtshon te phan yon rgya cher gsungs pa la dad pas yi dam du bya'o //
NK003(ga)007:75: yang gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs sogs bzla bar
NK003(ga)007:76: spro na'ang rnal 'byor 'di kho nas bklag par bya
NK003(ga)007:78: 'di'i tshab tu bzla ba gang 'dod bya chog go //
NK003(ga)007:79: mthar sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mi dmigs par bzhag /
NK003(ga)007:80: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
NK003(ga)007:81: 'jig rten 'dir ni myur du 'tshang rgya shog /
NK003(ga)007:82: 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
NK003(ga)007:83: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol //
NK003(ga)007:84: zhes sogs bsngo smon gyi rgyas gdab bo //
NK003(ga)007:85: deng sang rtse gcig sgom nus dkon //
NK003(ga)007:86: klog pa'i kha khral brtson pa mang //
NK003(ga)007:87: rgyal bas bklag par gdams 'di la //
NK003(ga)007:88: klog pa'i skal pa ldan na rmad //
NK003(ga)007:89: ces pa 'adi'ang chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston yab sras dang /
NK003(ga)007:90: ngor chen rdo rje 'chang las brgyud pa'i gdams ngag
NK003(ga)007:91: lag len du yon tan rgya mtshos bsdebs pa gzhan
